code: @Test public void testProgram() throws Exception {     String resultPath = getTempDirPath("result").     StreamExecutionEnvironment env = StreamExecutionEnvironment.getExecutionEnvironment().     DataStream<String> text = env.fromElements(WordCountData.TEXT).     DataStream<Tuple2<String, Integer>> counts = text.flatMap(new Tokenizer()).keyBy(0).sum(1).     counts.writeAsCsv(resultPath).     env.execute("WriteAsCsvTest").     // Strip the parentheses from the expected text like output     compareResultsByLinesInMemory(WordCountData.STREAMING_COUNTS_AS_TUPLES.replaceAll("[\\\\(\\\\)]", ""), resultPath). }
